column4: hello, anybody has solved modem problems with ZTE usb mobile broadband?
what kind of problems? what model?
I ask once more: what kind of problems? what model?
http://pastebin.com/5QR8QzEc
used to work long time ago, now I am in 12.10 and is not recognized by network manager
12.10? then #ubuntu+1
what happens?
the modem is not listed/recognized by network manager to connect
is it shown by lsusb?
yes
http://pastebin.com/TSaLiTKt
one simple solution I used:  after plugging it in it was recognized as a CD, so I typed     eject sr1, waited a little and could connect
if I remember correctly thats the same I did use
will try, however is not listed as a cd
you can open another terminal, type there   tailf /var/log/syslog     and watch what happens
I've seen that, thats why I said it is the same as mine :-)
http://pastebin.com/LeV8JLGE
I remember that part  too, but eventually it did "take" - I have not tried it in 12.04 though
it used to work long time ago, however I have updated and now...
sorry, then - I will have to try soon
I have a slightly different one: Bus 002 Device 005: ID 19d2:0015 ZTE WCDMA Technologies MSM, and it still seems to work
now this worked, but is a shame is not more transparent https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/modemmanager/+bug/891307 smiki comment
I agree that it is tiresome - but an glad that you got it sorted :)
me too, really, good bye
